activities: Communispace creates and manages private online communities.  The information voluntarily provided by community members may include name, address, email, gender, income, age, ethnicity, marital status, employment status, occcupation, education, age of children, and gender of children.  Communispace also collects personal human resources information from its employees in connection with human resources functions.
contacttitle1: Senior Director of Compliance and Information Security
personaldata: organization, client, customer and community member data
recoursemech:
Swiss FDPIC(for unresolved issues involving human resources data being transferred from Switzerland to the U.S.;
JAMS(for all other unresolved issues).
